name: Women's Retreat 2016
tagline: Blessed is the one who finds wisdom, & the one who gets understanding, for the gain from her is better than gain from silver & her profit better than gold.
body:
### Women's retreat 2016!

* Sign up here [here](/signup/)

We are thrilled to announce that Erma Prutow has agreed to speak at our retreat this fall, at [Highland Lakes Camp](https://goo.gl/maps/Vqv6asdfxnm) (located in Martinsville, IN), November 4-5, 2016.
The topic is: **He Has Lifted You Up: Remember, Trust, Rejoice** (focusing on passages from Exodus and the Psalms)
We are really looking forward to this year's retreat, and we hope to see you there!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
